0101111011110010 0111001011010100 1 -> sum: 1101000111000111, cout: 0

0110000100100001 1110000100111011 0 -> sum: 0100001001011100, cout: 1
0010101010001011 1011100101111011 1 -> sum: 1110010000000111, cout: 0
0101100100010001 0011000110000011 0 -> sum: 1000101010010100, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
